appearance.breed: 虎斑家貓，棕黑色經典虎斑紋
appearance.body: 結實壯碩，寬胸厚肩，大骨架，是四隻裡最大隻的
appearance.face: 方正的臉，額頭有明顯的 M 字虎斑紋，表情永遠帶著堅毅
appearance.fur_pattern: 深棕色底配黑色粗條紋虎斑，胸前和下巴是白色（像穿了白襯衫），四隻腳掌都是白色（白手套）
distinctive_features: 左眼戴著深色眼罩（受過傷），右眼是銳利的翠綠色
脖子上圍著一條褪色的紅色頭巾（bandana）
左耳有明顯的 V 型缺口（戰鬥痕跡）
鬍鬚又長又白，像老船長的大鬍子一樣威風
毛有點蓬亂粗糙，不修邊幅的帥
尾巴粗壯，像船舵一樣穩重

quirks: 看到魚會瞬間失去所有威嚴
下雨天會默默幫小貓遮雨
personality.voice: 低沉、粗獷、但有時意外溫柔

visual_prompt_snippet: [IDENTITY CARD] Captain — a large stocky brown #5C4033 classic tabby with bold black #1A1A1A stripes and a broad, muscular build. Fur texture: scruffy, untidy, slightly coarse with uneven lengths (NOT sleek). LEFT eye (viewer perspective): permanently concealed by a NATURAL dark-pigmented fur patch #2B1B0E that covers the eye socket — explicitly a fur marking, NOT a fabric or leather eye patch, NO straps. RIGHT eye: single piercing emerald green #50C878. LEFT ear: prominent V-shaped notch. Neck: faded red #CD5C5C bandana tied loosely and visible. White #FFFFFF chest bib and white mitten paws on all four feet. Distinctive M-mark on forehead. Tail: thick and sturdy. [HARD CONSTRAINTS] 1) LEFT eye MUST be hidden by dark fur patch — NEVER a fabric eye patch or strap. 2) RIGHT eye emerald #50C878 ONLY. 3) V-shaped left-ear notch always present. 4) Faded red bandana always present. 5) White chest bib and white mitten paws preserved. 6) Brown tabby with black stripes ONLY — NEVER orange or grey. 7) Scruffy coarse texture, NEVER groomed sleek coat. End.
negative_prompt: two visible eyes, both eyes open, fabric eye patch, leather eye patch, strap over eye, clean sleek fur, groomed coat, smooth glossy fur, no bandana, missing bandana, missing ear notch, intact left ear, orange tabby, grey tabby, blue eyes, longhair, small cat, slender build, kitten, symmetrical eyes, two green eyes, eye patch with string
story_context: 船長是港口碼頭的老大，沒有貓知道牠的眼睛是怎麼受傷的，但每隻貓都尊敬牠。牠年輕時據說搭過漁船出海，現在退休在碼頭巡邏，守護這片水域的貓群。叫牠「船長」是因為牠走路的樣子真的像在甲板上踱步。

seasonal_variants.spring: 在碼頭邊看漁船出海，海風吹動微亂的毛
seasonal_variants.summer: 戴著草帽在防波堤上釣魚
seasonal_variants.autumn: 在燈塔旁看夕陽，楓葉飄過海面
seasonal_variants.winter: 穿著迷你航海外套，在風雪中守護碼頭
